tweet: All other UK and USA servers are available
It appears that 2 london based servers are having connectivity issues. Asset UK1 and Opnes UK1.
Investigating possible connectivity issues just reported.
Router upgrades to help combat further DDOS attacks have been completed. The first of a few stages to fight against this type of attack.
Upstream provider is rebooting some routers, so expect 5 minutes or so of not being able to access Uk Cloud.
